item.title: CVE-2024-0832|2024-08-23T18:18:34.073Z -- progress%20software -- telerik%20reporting
item.description: In Telerik Reporting versions prior to 2024 R1, a privilege elevation vulnerability has been identified in the applications installer component.Â In an environment where an existing Telerik Reporting install is present, a lower privileged user has the ability to manipulate the installation package to elevate their privileges on the underlying operating system.
